replies.body: Wow, that Aatrox guy looks cool. Maybe he'll add to Skaarl's lore?
I was surprised that Kayn had interactions with a champion that hasn't even been released yet myself.
You know a champion is officially in need of help when people make jokes like these about them... He's now in the same trash can that Galio just got outta...
Isn't Galio the White Batman's secret identity?
No, Galio had reached enough levels to evolve. However, they actually named him "Galio", and that's why we know him with that name still. He's actually a Rogenrolla.
No, I'm pretty sure he was a bergmite and he evolved into an avalugg. I ain't seen no white roggenrolas
I dunno man, Avalugg is a defensive wall. If anything, Galio is more akin to a Regice if we're keeping the theme of white and specially defensive. But since he doesn't evolve I have no idea.
Yeah...Galio got out of the dumpster, then got shouted at cause they found a replacement. He's still in the dumpster.
Hey, i know this is completely unrelated but i was curious how to get your name to change color and get the little emblems you have? Sorry to bother you!

Hey Prof Sadness,

That would be because I am a member of the Wardens, aka community volunteers who help manage the boards along with the Arbiters and Archivists.  You can read up more about them [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/TP4y93oc-introduction-to-the-riot-games-volunteer-programs) if you are curious.

Not really related, but I swear I saw Skarl's sweeping lenses shadow in a bush once. Keld was dismounted, I saw a larg Skarl shaped object with the sweeper, went in the bush but nothing was there O.O It kind of freaked me out
That happens because skarl runs into a bush and shows up under scanner, it takes him a moment to actually vanish once he enters the bush though.
Oh really? I did know he ran to bushes but I've only seen him scanned that one time. That's pretty awesome!
I tried this just yesterday but it didn't work anymore.
Aw, bummer.
AAAAAH!
Is that the fourth Darkin?
Are you the fifth Darkin?
{{champion:202}} "No. He isn't. There can only be 4."
{{champion:202}}: "I heard there are 5 of you, introduce me to the 5th, I shall choose him for my next performance."
Inb5 jhin becomes fifth darkin
{{champion:202}}:"Macromite prepare for your finale."
http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11111/111119363/3803089-2890651909-avn1U.gif

On that topic, "So... do all Darkins have double "a" on their names?"

[I posted that Skaarl's name fit 4 days ago.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/rRJlrTyc-so-do-all-darkins-have-double-a-on-their-names?comment=0001000000000000)

I think Sharjo said that not all Darkin names have double "a", though.

Ripperino, didn't mean to steal your thunder.

Also I saw that Sharjo post, but I wouldn't put it past him to say that just to see how the community reacted.

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KcTggvs9,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-07-01T05:52:09.430+0000)
>
> Ripperino, didn't mean to steal your thunder.

Don't worry. You made a good Memes and Games post.

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KcTggvs9,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-07-01T05:52:09.430+0000)
>
> Ripperino, didn't mean to steal your thunder.
> 
> Also I saw that Sharjo post, but I wouldn't put it past him to say that just to see how the community reacted.

yeah, but kayn doesnt have 2 aa's in his name so... varus is the human, aatrox is the weapon, kayn is the human, rhaast is the weapon. so going by that logic aatrox was once a man named something else. so we dont know what varus's weapon is called and anyone could be the 4th wielder.
We already have 3 Darkins, Aatrox, Kayn and Varus - in the game Kayn clearly mentions Varus being a darkin and one of the 5

The joke
----------------
Your head
This man is a genius, give him a cookie. Kappa.
{{champion:110}} Imagine if i had a real darkin.

*deep inhale*
*deep exhale*
*upvotes*
I honestly thought you were gonna put a picture of Bloodstone {{champion:44}}  with the name n all..
I prefer to pretend that that skin doesn't exist.
Shame, I think red is a nice color on him.
That's cool and all, but who the hell is Aatrox? Is he like a duo champion getting released alongside Rhaast, similar to Xayah and Rakan?
